```{r echo = TRUE, results = 'hide'}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

<h2>Change Plots<h2>
```{r}
langs <- read.csv("data/cleaned/langs.csv")
for (fam in unique(langs$family)) {
    p <- langs %>% 
        filter(family == fam) %>%
        ggplot(aes(x=year, y=log(TotalBothSexes), color=language)) +
            geom_line() +
            ggtitle(fam)
    print(p)
}
```
